description.subTitle: Grateful Grazer
description.information: There is both an art and a science to living healthily that's the motto Grateful Grazer lives by. Registered dietician and recipe developer Stephanie McKercher showcases attractive plant-based meals and also provides research-based articles discussing the impact of nutrition on well being

description.subTitle: With Food + Love
description.information: Sherrie Castellano's With Food + Love blog features clever and flavorful, anti inflammatory, plant-based recipes and explores topics pertaining to chronic illness in her writings. Food + Love was a finalist in the 2015 Saveur Magazine Food Blog Awards. All of the recipes on With Food + Love are also gluten free. Try Castellano's Sweet Potato Crostini with Brie Honey and Jalape≈Ños
